Missing Values.impute_mean: Fill missing numeric values with mean
Missing Values.impute_median: Fill missing numeric values with median
Missing Values.impute_mode: Fill missing categorical values with mode
Missing Values.drop_rows: Remove rows with missing critical columns

Outliers.iqr_method: Remove outliers using IQR (Q1-1.5*IQR to Q3+1.5*IQR)
Outliers.z_score: Remove outliers using Z-score (>3 standard deviations)
Outliers.cap_values: Cap outliers at reasonable min/max values

Data Type Conversions.to_datetime: Convert date strings to datetime objects
Data Type Conversions.to_numeric: Convert numeric strings to numeric types
Data Type Conversions.to_category: Convert string columns to categorical (memory efficient)
Data Type Conversions.to_int: Convert float columns to integer where appropriate

Invalid Values.remove_invalid_dates: Remove rows with invalid or future dates
Invalid Values.remove_empty_teams: Remove rows with missing team names

Duplicates.remove_duplicate_matches: Remove duplicate matches (same teams, same date)
